## Conjecture (2017)

"Canonical $q$-deformations in arithmetic geometry"

If $R$ smooth $\mathbb{Z}$-algebra equipped with an étale map

$$
\operatorname{Spec} R 	o \mathbb{A}^d_{\mathbb{Z}}
$$

there is a cohom. theory for (proper smooth) varieties $X/R$, taking values in

$$
H^i_{q	ext{-}dR}(X/R\llbracket q-1rbracket)
$$

finitely generated $R\llbracket q-1rbracket$-modules + $q$-connection.

Specialization to $q=1$: $H^i_{dR}(X/R)$, Gauss-Manin connection.

$	ext{for } X/\mathbb{Z}_p$

\left\{
 egin{array}{l}

# Conjecture (2017)  
$$
\underline{\\text{S.}}
$$

"Canonical $q$-deformation  
in arithmetic geometry"

- If $R$ smooth $\mathbb{Z}$-algebra  
- Equipped with an étale map

  \operatorname{Spec} R \to \mathbb{A}^d_{\mathbb{Z}}
  $$

- There is a cohom. theory for (proper smooth)  
- $X/R$, taking values in

$$
(\omega, D(\omega)) 	ext{ basis}
$$

$$

abla^2(\omega) =  rac{1}{4\lambda(1-\lambda)}\omega +  rac{2\lambda-1}{\lambda(1-\lambda)}D(\omega).
$$

horizontal section is

$$
f(\lambda)\chi(1-\lambda)\omega - f'(\lambda)\chi(1-\lambda)
abla(\omega)
$$

for hypergeometric function

$$
f(\lambda) = \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \prod_{i=0}^{n-1} \left( rac{i+ rac{1}{2}}{n+1}ight)^2 \lambda^n.
$$

## Example: Legendre family

of elliptic curves

$R = \mathbb{Z}\left[ rac{1}{2}, \lambdaight]\left[ rac{1}{\lambda(1-\lambda)}ight]$

$F_{X/R}^{1} = H^{0}(X, \Omega_{X/R}^{2}) 
i \omega =  rac{dx}{y}$

$H_{dR}^{2}(X/R) \supset 	ext{free rk 2.}$

$X/R : 	ext{elliptic curve with affine model}$

$y^{2} = x(x-1)(x-\lambda).$

adelic gluing, over $(R \otimes \mathbb{Q})[ rac{1}{\lambda-17},$

get constant out of

$dR$ when.
